2.desc: Chance to drop a Purified Ether every <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>10</FONT>s at the monsters' location when attacking Normal rank monsters with less than <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>30%</FONT> HP.

5.desc: Increases Domination by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>50</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>15s</FONT>, up to <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>7</FONT> times when attacking a target with Paralysis. (Cooldown: <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>1s</FONT>)

2.desc: Decreases Movement Skill's cooldown by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10%</FONT>.

5.desc:
+<FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>12</FONT>s of Festival when using a skill.
At <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>6</FONT> stacks, gain Finale: +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10%</FONT> Damage to foes for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>1</FONT>m. Additionally, when the skill is used <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>17</FONT> times, gain Mayhem: +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>15%</FONT> Damage to foes for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>20</FONT>s. Mayhem and Festival do not stack.

2.desc: When attacking a foe, +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>3%</FONT> Atk. Speed for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>8</FONT>s, up to <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>9%</FONT> total. (Cooldown: <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>3</FONT>s)

5.desc: Increases Move Speed by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>20%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>20</FONT>s when attacking Boss monsters or above. If the buff lasts its full duration then Atk. Speed will increase by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>15%</FONT> and deal <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>20%</FONT> additional Damage for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>10</FONT>s. The buff will be removed if attacked. (Cooldown: <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>30</FONT>s)

2.desc:
On hit, gain Solar Power for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>6s</FONT> every <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>2s</FONT>.
Solar Power: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>3%</FONT> (Max. <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>5</FONT> stacks. Cannot be used in conjunction with Lunar Power)

5.desc:
At <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>5</FONT> stacks of Solar Power, gain Midday.
If a party member with an effect that is activated with 5 sets of Oath is within <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>3 meters</FONT> while Midday is active, you will gain Total Solar Eclipse.
 Midday: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>25%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>15s</FONT>.
 Total Solar Eclipse: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>25%</FONT> and Crit Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>50%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>15s</FONT>.

2.desc:
Gain Lunar Power for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>6s</FONT> every <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>2s</FONT> when you hit a foe.
Lunar Power: Crit Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>6%</FONT> (Max. <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>5</FONT> stacks. Cannot be used in conjunction with Solar Power.)

5.desc:
At <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>5</FONT> stacks of Lunar Power, change to Full Moon.
If a party member with an effect that is activated with 5 sets of Determination is within <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>3 meters</FONT> while Full Moon is active, you gain Total Lunar Eclipse.
 Full Moon: Crit Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>50%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>15s</FONT>.
 Total Lunar Eclipse: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>25%</FONT> and Crit Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>50%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>15s</FONT>.

2.desc: Move Speed: +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>5%</FONT>

On successful attack, gain Valtan's Power every <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>1s</FONT>: +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>1%</FONT> additional Damage to your foe for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>12s</FONT>. (Max <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>10</FONT> stacks)
Stacks decrease when you receive Damage.

4.desc: The effect of Valtan's Power increases by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>1%</FONT>, changing to Enhanced Valtan's Power. Using a Movement Skill increases Move Speed and Atk. Speed by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10%</FONT> for<FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>10s</FONT>.

6.desc: Enhanced Valtan's Power increases by <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>2%</FONT>, changing to Powerful Valtan's Power. Damage taken from foes -<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10%</FONT>.

2.desc:
On successful non-crit hit, gain Seduction every <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>0.3s</FONT>. This effect is removed when you critically hit.
Seduction: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#ffff99'>12s</FONT>. Max <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>10</FONT> stacks.

4.desc:
Charm's effect +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>15%</FONT>, changing it to Seduction.
Seduction: Crit Rate +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>25%</FONT> for <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>12s</FONT>. (Max <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>4</FONT> stacks.)

Creates a max of <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>3</FONT> Ether, and the Transcendence effect is activated when <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>3</FONT> different Ether effects are activated.

Targets that have protection effects (Shield, HP Regen, Damage Reduction) from party effects will have the Seed of Life applied for <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>12s</FONT>. Does not apply to protective effects with no duration.

When Seed of Life is stacked <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>20</FONT> times, the Seed of Life effect is removed and Life Activation is triggered for <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>10s</FONT>.

Healing effect is <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>doubled</FONT> if Current HP is below <FONT COLOR='#99ff99'>30%</FONT>.

This Damage decreases by up to <FONT COLOR='#ff9999'>80%</FONT> when striking multiple foes.

4.desc:
When a Class that possesses MP uses an Awakening Skill, gain Magick Addiction.
When MP reaches <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>30%</FONT> or lower, Magick Addiction is removed and Boundless MP is gained.
When current MP becomes <FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>100%</FONT> while Boundless MP is active, the effect is removed and Magick Addiction is gained. Both effects cannot be active at the same time.
Magick Addiction: Damage +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>15%</FONT>. When using a skill that consumes MP, Max MP -<FONT COLOR='#ff9999'>7%</FONT>.
Boundless MP: Recover +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>3%</FONT> of Max MP every 1s. Cooldown -<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>20%</FONT>. Atk./Move Speed +<FONT COLOR='#99FF99'>12%</FONT>.
